analyzed: rgya gar skad du ba ga sa dha nam

analyzed: bod skad du

original: ngag gi sgrub thabs /
analyzed: ngag gi sgrub thabs

original: 'phags pa 'jam dpal la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: phag ba jam dpal la phyag tshal lo

original: nyes pa'i dri 'joms dpal ldan rdo rje chos //
analyzed: nyes ba dri joms dpal ldan rdo rje chos

original: ngag gi dkyil 'khor 'od zer dra ba 'phro //
analyzed: ngag gi dkyil khor d zer dra ba phro

original: rdzogs sangs rgyas kun gyi gsung gi rang bzhin la //
analyzed: rdzogs sangs rgya kun gyi gsung gi rang bzhin la

original: phyag 'tshal nas ni ngag gi sgrub thabs bshad //
analyzed: phyag tshal nas ni ngag gi sgrub thabs chad

original: mkhas pas brtson 'grus rlung gis rab bskyod nas //
analyzed: mkhas ba brtson grus rlung gis rab skyod nas

original: sngags kyi rang bzhin rnam dag gzugs brjod cing //
analyzed: sngags kyi rang bzhin rnam dag gzugs rjod cing

original: 'jig rten tshogs pa 'dir nams sgyu ma dang // smig rgyu chu zla'i rtog pa bzhin dub sgom //
analyzed: jig rten tshogs ba dir nams sgyu ma dang smig rgyu chu zla rtogs ba bzhin dub sgom

original: pam yig sa bon las byung sna tshogs pad //
analyzed: pam yig sa bon las byung sna tshogs pad

original: bsgom bya rnam par dag pa kun gyi gzugs //
analyzed: bsgom byed rnam ba dag ba kun gyi gzugs

original: aam yig las skyes 'od zer mtha' yas pa //
analyzed: aam yig las skye d zer mtha yas ba

original: rnam dag zla ba cha shas kun rdzogs pa //
analyzed: rnam dag zla ba cha shas kun rdzogs ba

original: slar yang gsang ba mchog gyur dag pa yi //
analyzed: slar yang gsang ba mchog gyur dag ba yi

original: sa bon yi ge 'od zer dra ba 'gyed //
analyzed: sa bon yi ge d zer dra ba gyed

original: bandhu'i me tog 'od zer dang mtshungs pa'i //
analyzed: bandhu me tog d zer dang mtshungs ba

original: ngag gi spros pa brkyang mdzad rgyu gcig po //
analyzed: ngag gi spros ba rkyong mdzad rgyu gcig po

original: sa bon las byung skyon du ma gyur ba'i //
analyzed: sa bon las byung skyon du ma gyur ba

analyzed: ting dzin phyag rgya tshim mdzad padma phyag brtse ba mngon dga rdo rje gdan la bzhugs

original: rdo rje'i chags pa dpal ldan yongs dag chags //
analyzed: rdo rje chags ba dpal ldan yongs dag chags

original: ba spu'i khung bu las byung sangs rgyas kyi //
analyzed: ba spu khung bu las byung sangs rgya kyi

original: sprin tshogs dra ba 'gro la phan par mdzad //
analyzed: sprin tshogs dra ba gro la phan ba mdzad

original: 'gro ba rnams kyi rang bzhin thams cad kyang //
analyzed: gro ba rnams kyi rang bzhin thams cad kyang

original: shin tu rnam dag blo yis bsgom par bya //
analyzed: shin tu rnam dag blo yis bsgom ba byed

original: snying gar zla ba'i dkyil du rdo rje yi //
analyzed: snying gar zla ba dkyil du rdo rje yi

original: 'od zer dra bas 'jig rten kun gsal blta //
analyzed: d zer dra ba jig rten kun gsal lta

original: mgon po h'um yig las ni skyes gyur pa //
analyzed: mgon po hum yig las ni skye gyur ba

original: sku lnga'i bdag nyid las byung sangs rgyas sprin //
analyzed: sku lnga bdag nyid las byung sangs rgya sprin

original: de dbus rtse mo 'phro ba'i me yi khrod //
analyzed: de dbus rtse mo phro ba me yi khrod

original: sku gnas srid pa gsum po snang bar mdzad ;
analyzed: sku gnas srid ba gsum po snang ba mdzad

analyzed: po brgyud kyi sdug sngal kun khyab rnams

analyzed: yi ge chen pos gang ba rnam ba joms

original: brjod pa rab mdzes 'od zer gyis khyab pas //
analyzed: rjod ba rab mdzes d zer gyis khyab ba

original: dri med nyi ma 'char ka dga' bas chags //
analyzed: dri med nyi ma char ka dga ba chags

analyzed: rdo rje las byung sdig ba rnam ba joms

analyzed: de yi rtse mor g-yo zhing rab chags ba

analyzed: d zer rgya chen de nyid bsam ba

analyzed: bdag gi brtson grus mthu yis gzhan zil gnon

analyzed: skad cig la goms stobs la skye gyur ba

original: ngag 'grub dngos grub rnams ni nyer thob 'gyur //
analyzed: ngag grub dngos grub rnams ni nyer thob gyur

analyzed: tshigs gcod rkyang ba rtag tu smra gyur zhing

analyzed: rnal byor ston chos sna tshogs rig ba dang ston chos sna tshogs nges ba rtsom gyur zhing

analyzed: rang nyid gro ba ched du don chen gyur

analyzed: gzhan gyi sems kyis jug ba du shes gyur

analyzed: chags sogs sdig ba rnams kyang de yis joms

original: de la ting 'dzin brtan pa thob gyur nas //
analyzed: de la ting dzin brtan ba thob gyur nas

analyzed: shin tu phra zhing rno phro nges ba yis

original: sangs rgyas go 'phang kun thob gzugs 'dzin 'gyur //
analyzed: sangs rgya go phen kun thob gzugs dzin gyur

original: de dag 'dir ni rnam par spyad bya min //
analyzed: de dag dir ni rnam ba spyod byed min

analyzed: rnal byor goms ba gyur na skye bu yi

analyzed: byung dang ma byung ba rnams mdun gnas gyur

analyzed: sems kyi rjes jug sbyor ba dang ldan gyur

analyzed: di byed bdag gis dge ba nyer bsags gang

analyzed: gro rnams rgyal ba dpal mchog dzin gyur cig ri bong dzin ba d zer nye ba yis

analyzed: rang bzhin di yis padma rigs jug cing

analyzed: bdag kyang legs ba skye bo srid rtse dis

analyzed: bar ba phreng ba dbus kyi skur gyur cig bla ma mchog gi brtse ba thod phreng gi
